code: import{GLOBALTYPES}from'../actions/globalTypes';var initialState={};var authReducer=function authReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GLOBALTYPES.AUTH:return action.payload;default:return state;}};export default authReducer;
